sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-form :form="tabCustInfo" layout="horizontal" hideRequiredMark>
    <a-row>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="客户名称"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-input
            v-if="disabled"
            disabled="disabled"
            v-decorator="['processCode']"
            placeholder="默认带出"
          />
          <template v-else="disabled">getProcessInfo</template>
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="图号"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-input v-if="disabled" v-decorator="['processCode']" placeholder="请输入图号"/>
          <!-- <template v-else="disabled">{{getProcessInfo.code}}</template> -->
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="图号版本号"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-input v-if="disabled" v-decorator="['processCode']" placeholder="请输入图号版本号"/>
          <!-- <template v-else="disabled">{{getProcessInfo.code}}</template> -->
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="客户编码"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-input v-if="disabled" v-decorator="['processCode']" placeholder="请输入客户编码"/>
          <!-- <template v-else="disabled">{{getProcessInfo.code}}</template> -->
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="物料号"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-input v-if="disabled" v-decorator="['processCode']" placeholder="请输入物料号"/>
          <!-- <template v-else="disabled">{{getProcessInfo.code}}</template> -->
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="材质"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-input v-if="disabled" v-decorator="['processCode']" placeholder="请输入材质"/>
          <!-- <template v-else="disabled">{{getProcessInfo.code}}</template> -->
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="客户规格"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-input v-if="disabled" v-decorator="['processCode']" placeholder="请输入客户规格"/>
          <!-- <template v-else="disabled">{{getProcessInfo.code}}</template> -->
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="物料名"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-input v-if="disabled" v-decorator="['processCode']" placeholder="请输入物料名"/>

          <!-- <template v-else="disabled">{{getProcessInfo.code}}</template> -->
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="备注"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-input v-if="disabled" v-decorator="['processCode']" placeholder="请输入备注"/>
          <!-- <template v-else="disabled">{{getProcessInfo.code}}</template> -->
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
    </a-row>
  </a-form>
</template>
<script>
import { getGoodsClass } from '../../basic_lib/index'
import { mixinBasic, mixinIsEdit } from '@/components/tools/mixin/mixin'

export default {
  name: 'CustInfo',
  mixins: [mixinBasic, mixinIsEdit],
  data() {
    return {
      tabCustInfo: this.$form.createForm(this),
      options: []
    }
  },
  created() {
    // 产品分类
    getGoodsClass.call(this)
  },
  methods: {
    onChangeGoodsClass(value) {
      console.log(value)
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
</style>
